detail.name: UCAV
detail.desc: A small reconnaissance unmanned combat aerial vehicle armed with an explosive warhead that allows the support class to use it as guided munitions.

unlocks.name: VARIABLE ZOOM [14X]
unlocks.desc: Adds another toggleable 14x magnification mode to any high-powered scope.

unlocks.name: BIPOD
unlocks.desc: Enables you to enter Supported Shooting when prone and on most covers. Improves Stability and Accuracy when deployed.

unlocks.name: ACOG [4X]
unlocks.desc: Advanced Combat Optic Gunsight medium speed and medium range scope which magnifies at 4x.

unlocks.name: CANTED IRONSIGHTS
unlocks.desc: Ironsights canted at a 45 degree angle for quick target acquisition at close range, even when using a scope.

unlocks.name: STRAIGHT PULL
unlocks.desc: Removes the need to zoom out between shots, allowing for rapid follow-up shots.

unlocks.name: REFLEX [RDS]
unlocks.desc: American red dot sight with a sharp reticle and a clear sight picture for rapid target acquisition and tracking.

unlocks.name: LASER SIGHT
unlocks.desc: Bright red laser sight improves Hip Fire via a 25% reduction in the hip fire penalty. Can blind enemies at moderate ranges.

unlocks.name: SUPPRESSOR
unlocks.desc: Western silencer that increases stealth by hiding your muzzle report and position on the minimap. Reduces bullet velocity and increases bullet drop.

unlocks.name: M145 [3.4X]
unlocks.desc: 3.4x sight optimized for mid to long range engagements. Most commonly found on M240 and M249 LMG weapons.

unlocks.name: FLASH LIGHT
unlocks.desc: Lights up dark corners and disorients nearby enemies. Especially blinding against IRNV and FLIR sight equipment.

unlocks.name: MUZZLE BRAKE
unlocks.desc: Improves Stability by reducing muzzle climb by 25%, but adds a 30% penalty to the Accuracy of automatic fire.

unlocks.name: HOLO [1X]
unlocks.desc: Open sight picture for close- to mid-range engagements. The reticle features a ballistic circle and dot configuration.

unlocks.name: BALLISTIC [40X]
unlocks.desc: A very high-powered scope with a serious 40x magnification for taking out targets at the most extreme distances.

unlocks.name: RANGE FINDER
unlocks.desc: Laser range finder that displays the distance to the target as well as the current zero distance on the weapon. No beam can be detected from this laser.

unlocks.desc: Russian reflex sight with a T cross reticle that keeps the point of aim clearer than other red dot sights.

detail.name: REPAIR TOOL
detail.desc: Hand held oxy-fuel welding and cutting torch that repairs friendly vehicles and damages enemy vehicles and infantry.

detail.name: XM25 SMOKE
detail.desc: Fires 25mm grenades that can explode mid-flight creating an airburst smoke effect to block sight and spotting. Aiming down the sights at a cover will lock in that distance, allowing the grenade to explode in the air 3 meters past the cover.

detail.name: HVM-II
detail.desc: Fires a cluster of 3 projectiles that are highly effective against both Aircraft and Light Vehicles. Launcher must maintain lock until the missile hits the target. Capable of locking on to laser designated targets.

detail.name: BALLISTIC SHIELD
detail.desc: A heavy ballistic shield that will easily stop most small projectiles. The viewport, however, is vulnerable to heavy rounds such as shotgun slugs, sniper fire and explosives.

detail.name: PLD
detail.desc: Portable Laser Designator that laser paints targets while lock is maintained. The designator enables friendlies with missile systems to lock on to the targeted vehicles.

detail.name: REPAIR TOOL
detail.desc: Hand held oxy-fuel welding and cutting torch that repairs friendly vehicles and damages enemy vehicles and infantry.

detail.name: AMMO PACK
detail.desc: Single use Ammo Pack that resupplies a small amount of bullets to a single soldier on the move.

detail.name: FIRST AID PACK
detail.desc: Single use Medic Pack that slowly heals a single soldier to full health, even on the move. Any damage will cancel the heal.

detail.name: DEFIBRILLATOR
detail.desc: Automated External Defibrillator (AED) revives downed teammates and electrocutes enemies. Charging the paddles will revive teammates with increased health. Needs to recharge after multiple quick uses.

detail.name: OFFENSIVE
detail.desc:
LEVEL 1: SPRINT:
Increases maxiumum Sprint Speed by 10%

LEVEL 2: AMMO:
Increases maximum inventory of Bullets by 50%

LEVEL 3: GRENADES:
Increases maximum inventory of Hand Grenades by 1

LEVEL 4: REDUCED FALL:
Increases height you can Fall without Damage

detail.name: COMBAT MEDIC
detail.desc:
LEVEL 1: MEDKIT UPGRADE:
Increases maximum deployed Medic Bags and Packs by 1

LEVEL 2: SPRINT:
Increases maximum Sprint Speed by 10%

LEVEL 3:
DEFIB UPGRADE: Increases charge up speed of the Defibrillators by 100%

LEVEL 4: MEDICAL UNIT:

detail.desc: Anti-personnel mine that launches 3 trip wires shortly after being deployed. Breaking a wire will detonate the mine. A mine with no trip wires is unable to detonate and should be redeployed.

detail.name: M224 MORTAR
detail.desc: Remote-controlled 60mm Mortar that fires high explosive rounds using a terrain grid targeting system. Shells travel a ballistic path and may hit objects between the launcher and the intended target. Rapid fire is very inaccurate, single shells have great precision.

detail.name: MP-APS
detail.desc: Man-Portable Active Protection System that detonates incoming explosive Rockets and Shells from both infantry and vehicles before they can hit their targets. Will not stop normal bullets or hand thrown grenades. Can destroy multiple incoming threats in a 180-degree arc, but must recharge between uses.
